And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> Stand <S%G1453><s%> forth. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3319><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to do <S%G15>good<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>days,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to do <S%G2554>evil?<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to kill? <S%G615><s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> held their <S%G4623>peace.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had looked round <S%G4017>about<s%> on <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3709>anger,<s%> being <S%G4818>grieved<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4457>hardness<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> Stretch <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he stretched it <S%G1614>out:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G243>other.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> went <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> took <S%G4160>counsel<s%> <S%G4824><s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many;<s%> insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> they pressed <S%G1968>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> for <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>plagues.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> fell down <S%G4363>before<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4183>straitly<s%> <S%G2008>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5318>known.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he goeth <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>calleth<s%> unto him <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2309>would:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G565>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4160>ordained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might send them <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2784>preach,<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G3554>sicknesses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to cast <S%G1544>out<s%> devils: <S%G1140><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> he <S%G2007>surnamed<s%> <S%G3686><s%> <S%G4074>Peter;<s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> He <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

There <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> his <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>without,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5455>calling<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> brethren? <S%G80><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4017>looked<s%> round <S%G2945>about<s%> on them which <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> brethren! <S%G80><s%>
